participant_1.background: i am 100 years old. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i remember when nobody had a television. i feel like i might live forever. i'm very strong for my age.

participant_2.background: i will be released in about a month. i am currently in a juvenile detention center. i feel old. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.

content.text: hi, are you here to visit me?
